modName: Wet and Cold - Hooded Fur Scarf Fix
summary: Fix for Hooded Fur Scarves in Wet and Cold
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#e06666]<Oldrim version not supported since i moved to SE>[/color]

[color=#f1c232][b]Little fix of Hooded Fur Scarves.[/b][/color]

[color=#ffffff]In original Mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?][b]Wet and Cold[/b] by Isoku[/url] Hooded Fur Scarves look like just Fur Hoods. 
This mod made them look like Scarves with Hoods. See pictures for details.[/color]

[color=#f1c232][b]Requirements:[/b][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold[/url] installed
[b]
[color=#f1c232]Install:[/color][/b]
Drop file from archive to Data folder or use Mod Manager.

[b][color=#f1c232]For Skyrim SE:[/color][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11320][color=#5ea2e5]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11320[/color]
[/url]
[color=#a4c2f4]Enjoy![/color][/size]
author: rx310
